<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scevconstant">SCEVConstant</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a6a9f043784cf87001c84980afa76da82">D</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;SCEVConstant&gt;</a>(Denominator)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> NumeratorVal = Numerator-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scevconstant/#a6caf7f3a0a4303e4c0bc06ed8e205126">getAPInt</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> DenominatorVal = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a6a9f043784cf87001c84980afa76da82">D</a>-&gt;getAPInt();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><Highlight kind="normal">    uint32&#95;t NumeratorBW = NumeratorVal.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a512fe2c15ea651294688eeec1341644c">getBitWidth</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><Highlight kind="normal">    uint32&#95;t DenominatorBW = DenominatorVal.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a512fe2c15ea651294688eeec1341644c">getBitWidth</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (NumeratorBW &gt; DenominatorBW)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><Highlight kind="normal">      DenominatorVal = DenominatorVal.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#aca8fce65eb69a82aa10a635e2e79877a">sext</a>(NumeratorBW);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (NumeratorBW &lt; DenominatorBW)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><Highlight kind="normal">      NumeratorVal = NumeratorVal.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#aca8fce65eb69a82aa10a635e2e79877a">sext</a>(DenominatorBW);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> RemainderVal(NumeratorVal.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a512fe2c15ea651294688eeec1341644c">getBitWidth</a>(), 0);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><Highlight kind="normal">    Quotient = SE.getConstant(QuotientVal);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Check whether Denominator divides one of the product operands.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scev">SCEV</a> &#42;Q, &#42;R;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="204"><Highlight kind="normal">    Qs.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>(Q);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="208"><Highlight kind="normal">    Remainder = Zero;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Qs.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#a1c479a8c434377c2b8cb056bdfdfc201">size</a>() == 1)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="210"><Highlight kind="normal">      Quotient = Qs&#91;0&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="212"><Highlight kind="normal">      Quotient = SE.getMulExpr(Qs);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="213"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="214"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="216"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a92ca992e52dddc420f4b069cae06dfbe">isa&lt;SCEVUnknown&gt;</a>(Denominator))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="217"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> cannotDivide(Numerator);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="218"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="219"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The Remainder is obtained by replacing Denominator by 0 in Numerator.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="220"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a1e20046d7dec4528da23e2c01de947ed">ValueToSCEVMapTy</a> RewriteMap;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="221"><Highlight kind="normal">  RewriteMap&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac4fc845f5ed92de63cd4474f128f5fc5">cast&lt;SCEVUnknown&gt;</a>(Denominator)-&gt;getValue()&#93; = Zero;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="222"><Highlight kind="normal">  Remainder = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scevparameterrewriter/#ab060c388d5c4cca1b50729c582e7bcba">SCEVParameterRewriter::rewrite</a>(Numerator, SE, RewriteMap);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="223"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="224"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Remainder-&gt;isZero()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="225"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The Quotient is obtained by replacing Denominator by 1 in Numerator.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="226"><Highlight kind="normal">    RewriteMap&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac4fc845f5ed92de63cd4474f128f5fc5">cast&lt;SCEVUnknown&gt;</a>(Denominator)-&gt;getValue()&#93; = One;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="227"><Highlight kind="normal">    Quotient = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scevparameterrewriter/#ab060c388d5c4cca1b50729c582e7bcba">SCEVParameterRewriter::rewrite</a>(Numerator, SE, RewriteMap);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="228"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00229" /><CodeLine lineNumber="229"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="230"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="231"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Quotient is (Numerator - Remainder) divided by Denominator.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="232"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scev">SCEV</a> &#42;Q, &#42;R;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="233"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scev">SCEV</a> &#42;Diff = SE.getMinusSCEV(Numerator, Remainder);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="234"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This SCEV does not seem to simplify: fail the division here.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="235"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (sizeOfSCEV(Diff) &gt; sizeOfSCEV(Numerator))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="236"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> cannotDivide(Numerator);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="237"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/scevdivision/#a0dfe5dc28e2f4ac38e33880cfd0170ae">divide</a>(SE, Diff, Denominator, &amp;Q, &amp;R);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="238"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (R != Zero)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="239"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> cannotDivide(Numerator);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00240" /><CodeLine lineNumber="240"><Highlight kind="normal">  Quotient = Q;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="241"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00242" /><CodeLine lineNumber="242"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="243"><Highlight kind="normal">SCEVDivision::SCEVDivision(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scalarevolution">ScalarEvolution</a> &amp;S, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scev">SCEV</a> &#42;Numerator,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="244"><Highlight kind="normal">                           </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scev">SCEV</a> &#42;Denominator)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="245"><Highlight kind="normal">    : SE(S), Denominator(Denominator) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="246"><Highlight kind="normal">  Zero = SE.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scalarevolution/#a2579491850c605c8b7cf3439a907fbed">getZero</a>(Denominator-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scev/#aefeda9454a5e8dfcec3deb106964832a">getType</a>());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="247"><Highlight kind="normal">  One = SE.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scalarevolution/#a3fbe8f529d36d76730550905d730a2a7">getOne</a>(Denominator-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scev/#aefeda9454a5e8dfcec3deb106964832a">getType</a>());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="248"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="249"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We generally do not know how to divide Expr by Denominator. We initialize</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="250"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the division to a &quot;cannot divide&quot; state to simplify the rest of the code.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="251"><Highlight kind="normal">  cannotDivide(Numerator);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="252"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="253"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00254" /><CodeLine lineNumber="254"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Convenience function for giving up on the division. We set the quotient to</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00255" /><CodeLine lineNumber="255"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// be equal to zero and the remainder to be equal to the numerator.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00256" /><CodeLine lineNumber="256"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> SCEVDivision::cannotDivide(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scev">SCEV</a> &#42;Numerator) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00257" /><CodeLine lineNumber="257"><Highlight kind="normal">  Quotient = Zero;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00258" /><CodeLine lineNumber="258"><Highlight kind="normal">  Remainder = Numerator;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00259" /><CodeLine lineNumber="259"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>

</ProgramListing>
